import React from "react"; import { IFeatures } from "../../interfaces/IFeatures"; import "./Features.scss"; const Features = ({ features }: { features: IFeatures }) => { const { diagonal, platform, memory } = features; return (

  • Платформа: {platform}

  • Диагональ: {diagonal}

  • Объем памяти: {memory}
